clinical_study.brief_title: Evaluation of Number of Patient Eyes That Remained on or Switched to Anti-VEGF Treatment After Initiation of Broluciumab
clinical_study.official_title: Treatment History, Demographic Characteristics, Clinical Characteristics, and Early Treatment Patterns of Patients Who Received Brolucizumab for Neovascular Age-related Macular Degeneration: IRIS Registry Study

brief_summary.textblock: This was a retrospective cohort study to assess the treatment history, demographic characteristics, clinical characteristics, and early treatment patterns of patients who received brolucizumab for neovascular age-related macular degeneration using IRIS Registry.

detailed_description.textblock:
This was a retrospective cohort study of patients with wet AMD who received brolucizumab. Evidence was generated from the IRIS registry to describe patient treatment histories, demographic and clinical characteristics, and early treatment patterns.
Setting and study population:
IRIS Registry EHR data from 10/08/2018 to the 03/31/2020 from patients with wet AMD who initiated brolucizumab were analyzed.
Identification period of the index date: The patients fulfilling the selection criteria identified during the period from 10/08/2019 to 03/31/2020.
Index date: Defined as the date of the earliest brolucizumab injection.
Study Period: The period from 10/08/2018 to 03/31/2020.
Pre-index period: The period 12 months prior to the index date.
Post-index period: The period 4 months after the index date (not a required selection criterion; only for the assessment of select endpoints in a subgroup of patients).

primary_outcome.measure: Number of patients eyes with wet AMD that switched to another anti-VEGF agent (switchers) after initiation of brolucizumab within 4 months
primary_outcome.time_frame: Up to 4 months post brolucizumab injection
primary_outcome.description: To describe anti-VEGF treatment status (naive or switcher) in patients with wet AMD who initiated brolucizumab

secondary_outcome.description: Age information was reported
Gender information was reported
Northeast, North Central, South, West, Unknown
Private, Medicare, Medicare Advantage, Medicaid, Other
Unilateral, Bilateral
White, African American, Asian

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of participants: Concurrent eye disease
secondary_outcome.description: Participants were measured at the eye level for the following eye diseases: Cataracts, Posterior vitreous detachment, Epiretinal membrane, Macular hole, Vitreomacular traction, Amblyopia, Pseudophakia, Glaucoma, Diabetic macular edema, Retinal vein occlusion, Diabetic retinopathy, Myopic choroidal neovascularization

secondary_outcome.time_frame: At the brolucizumab index date defined as the date of first brolucizumab injection
secondary_outcome.description: Participants were categorized based on provider specialty at date of first brolucizumab injection (e.g. Retina specialist, Ophthalmologist, etc)

secondary_outcome.time_frame: At the brolucizumab index date defined as the date of first brolucizumab injection
secondary_outcome.description: Midwest, Northeast, South, West, Unknown
e.g. OD [eye, right], OS [eye, left], Unspecified

secondary_outcome.time_frame: At the brolucizumab index date defined as the date of first brolucizumab injection
secondary_outcome.description: Visual acuity using Snellen and approximate Early Treatment Diabetic Retinopathy Study [ETDRS] letters). Snellen VA ranges: 20/12-20/20 20/25-20/40 20/50-20/160 20/200 or worse

secondary_outcome.measure: Wet AMD diagnosis for the fellow eye
secondary_outcome.time_frame: At the brolucizumab index date defined as the date of first brolucizumab injection
secondary_outcome.description: Wet AMD diagnosis for the fellow eye as of the index date (Yes/No)

secondary_outcome.measure: Visual acuity of the fellow eye
secondary_outcome.time_frame: At the brolucizumab index date defined as the date of first brolucizumab injection
secondary_outcome.description: Visual acuity using Snellen and approximate Early Treatment Diabetic Retinopathy Study [ETDRS] letters). Snellen VA ranges: 20/12-20/20 20/25-20/40 20/50-20/160 20/200 or worse
Number of anti-VEGF treatments used prior to brolucizumab at index by number of eyes were reported

secondary_outcome.measure: Type of prior anti-VEGF treatment among switchers to brolucizumab
secondary_outcome.description: Type of anti-VEGF agent (aflibercept, bevacizumab, ranibizumab, unlicensed bevacizumab) used immediately prior to index were reported
Prior treatment sequence(s) for previously treated eyes were reported. Continuous or Categorical (aflibercept, bevacizumab and ranibizumab)

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of prior anti-VEGF injections received prior to brolucizumab index date
secondary_outcome.description: Total and Per treatment prior anti-VEGF injections received prior to brolucizumab index date were reported

secondary_outcome.measure: Injection intervals for the eyes that had received anti-VEGF injections prior to index
secondary_outcome.description: Last injection interval, Average of last two injection intervals and Average of last three injection intervals were reported

secondary_outcome.measure: Anti-VEGF treatment status for the fellow eye
secondary_outcome.time_frame: At the brolucizumab index date defined as the date of first brolucizumab injection
secondary_outcome.description: Anti-VEGF treatment endpoints for the fellow eyes with wet AMD (Naive, Switcher) were reported

secondary_outcome.measure: Type of treatment for the fellow eye
secondary_outcome.time_frame: At the brolucizumab index date defined as the date of first brolucizumab injection
secondary_outcome.description: Following type of treatment for the fellow eye will be reported: aflibercept, bevacizumab, ranibizumab, brolucizumab, unlicensed bevacizumab, or none)

secondary_outcome.measure: The number of prior anti-VEGF treatments for the fellow eye
secondary_outcome.time_frame: At the brolucizumab index date defined as the date of first brolucizumab injection
secondary_outcome.description: Number of prior anti-VEGF injections for the fellow eye will be reported: Continuous or Categorical (e.g. 0, 1, ≥2)

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of brolucizumab injections received per study eye
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Up to 4 months post index date
secondary_outcome.description: Early treatment patterns after brolucizumab index date in anti-VEGF switcher and anti-VEGF naive patient eyes were reported

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Up to 4 months post index date
secondary_outcome.description: The length of the interval between the final two injections was reported

secondary_outcome.measure: The first injection interval after switch compared to last injection interval with a prior treatment
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Up to 4 months post index date
secondary_outcome.description: Longer, same or shorter interval were reported

secondary_outcome.measure: Type of anti-VEGF agent initiated after switching from index brolucizumab
secondary_outcome.time_frame: First 3 months after switching from index brolucizumab
secondary_outcome.description: Thr type of anti-VEGF agent initiated in the first 3 months after switching from index brolucizumab. were reported

arm_group.description: Participants received brolucizumab injection during the index period

intervention.description: Participants received brolucizumab injection during the index period

study_pop.textblock: Patients with wet AMD who initiated brolucizumab were analyzed in this study

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Patients with ≥1 brolucizumab injection
- Diagnosis of wet AMD (ICD-10: H35.3210, H35.3211, H35.3212, H35.3213, H35.3220, H35.3221, H35.3222, H35.3223, H35.3230, H35.3231, H35.3232, H35.3233, H35.3290, H35.3291, H35.3292, and H35.3293) on the index date
Exclusion Criteria:
- There were no exclusion criteria
